Ask HN: Why doesn't HN celebrate people's achievements before they die?
text:
For example, this could be done when people retire or are terminally ill.

I'm sure the people in question would like to see public forums remember and celebrate their work while they are still alive.

title: Everything C# with Lead Designer Mads Torgersen
Show HN: Organize and Share your links more efficiently
text:
Rackoot is a FREE platform that helps you to organize and share your links. You can have multiple dashboards (Rackoots) and organize links in tiles adding comments and sharing them with whoever you want.
Try it, and get organized!
